name: Super Blobland
description: Super Blobland is a little action-platformer inspired by the original Gameboy era. You run, you jump, you shoot. It's pretty hard. I got the inspiration to make it replaying the Gameboy Megaman games. I find modern games with way too many menus and tutorials boring, and I thought 'what was wrong with games like this?' (figure of speech; there were definitely things wrong with them). I thought there could still be a market for them if they were priced at just a couple of dollars, so I made one, and priced it at just a couple of dollars. The game was more or less a solo project in Unity/C#, although lots of the music and a few other odds and ends are creative commons. I actually made it a few years ago, but I'm posting it here to see if there's any interest in my doing more updates or a 'deluxe' version, which I'd love to do.
